summary: A layer‑normalization component designed for ConvNeXt architectures that can operate on tensors in either NHWC (channels‑last) or NCHW (channels‑first) layout, automatically handling the dimension ordering during the forward pass.
business_intent: Enable flexible and reusable normalization across different convolutional model implementations, reducing the need for data‑format‑specific code and improving model portability and training stability.
